name: Hero Feeder
description:
This is an unfinished game where you must feed the heroes who come to protect your village. 

The goal is to buy seed, grow food, sell it to the heroes with the best stats for them (give atk food to warriors and mag food to mage).

Use a joypad to play if possible.

Move: D-pad or keyboard E/S/D/F

Roll: Xbox: A or keyboard space

Activate: Xbox X or keyboard G

Drop: Xbox B or keyboard R

Food stats:

Beetroot: +1atk / +1mag / +1hp

Cabbage: +3atk / +0mag / +0hp

Carrot: +0atk / +3mag / +0hp

Cauliflower: +0atk / +0mag / +10hp

Kale: +12atk / +0mag / +6hp

Parsnip: +0atk / +10mag / +5hp

Potato: +5atk / +5mag / +50hp

Pumpkin: +50atk / +0mag / +30hp

Radish: +0atk / +50mag / +30hp

Sunflower: +20atk / +20mag / +75hp

Wheat: +40atk / +40mag / +200hp
